title: Ticket #6867: scitokens: starter silently ignores error when fetching creds
description:
If the socket between the starter and shadow is not encrypted, then we get the following error message in the starter log: 

ERROR: Can't do CONDOR_getcreds, syscall_sock not encrypted

That's reasonable. However, in jic_shadow.cpp, the return value of REMOTE_CONDOR_getcreds() is ignored. Thus, the starter continues to start the job without the appropriate credentials.

This should be a fatal error on the starter side - jobs shouldn't start without their requested credentials.
